items.author: Penny P.

items.author: Falto un producto

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good sweater with some considerations before purchasing...
items.body: I wanted to love this cardigan, and it is probably right for many buyers, but the fit was awkward for my body type and what I was looking for. This being said, with the right information, you may have a better experience if you get the right fit. I am more curvy, bottom heavy hourglass, and tend to wear clothes that are a little more fitted, as sometimes larger shirts or sweaters can look boxy on me if they don't have a waist. This cardigan was very oversized, to the point I just wouldn't wear without modifications, as it looks comical. I ordered an XL because I usually wear this size in thicker, less stretchy sweaters or jackets. However, I am a cusp size with a large and this added to the issue of this being entirely too large on me. For sizing, I would recommend sizing down, even if you want an oversized look. I think it is at least 1-2 sizes too big. If you want a fitted look you may want to size down two sizes. This item just felt a bit undefined, like it had not real shape, and it hung kind of limp to me. I may pair with leggings and a belt to see if this helps for a sweater dress look. As far as quality, this cardigan is 5/5. They did not skimp, and the materials are thick, warm, and what I would expect for this price. They make sure to include extra buttons in case you lose one, with the buttons themselves being thick, durable, and made with nice materials as well. This looks to be very well made with elevated hemming and craftsmanship. The material is not necessarily soft, but feels thick and warm and cozy. Overall, this is a quality product that I think buyers would enjoy if they get the sizing correct. Make sure to keep in mind how large it is if you are not looking for an extra big fit (though this may look cute in a kawaii look). Other than this, this sweater is a great addition to your closet. However, I do think it is overpriced, and likely due to being name brand. However, you will be hard pressed to find this style, with this attention to detail, with this quality, elsewhere. So, this can make it worth the extra expense. If you do buy it, and get the right size, I do not think you will be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Queen Holocene

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars To boxy hanging
items.body: Beautiful Tommy sweater but I am 5'2 and 175 and the XL was way to boxy looking for me. On the model it looks great. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Captain Multi, Ivory Multi, Light Heather Fawn Multi, Medium Heather Grey Multi, Forest Multi. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
